context.introduction: Learn about the essential tools and techniques in an Italian kitchen. Discover the importance of pans, grating tools, and seasoning methods.

sections.title: Pasta Pans
sections.content: A wide, shallow pan is best for making pasta sauces, allowing for even cooking and easy mixing.

sections.title: Basil Preparation
sections.content: Basil should be torn by hand, not cut, to preserve its aroma and color.

sections.title: Seasoning Techniques
sections.content: Italian dishes are seasoned with salt, pepper, and sometimes a touch of chili flakes for balance.

sections.title: Grating Cheese
sections.content: A fine grater is used to add freshly grated cheese to pasta and salads.

sections.title: Tool Tips
listItems: Use the right pan for each sauce
Tear basil by hand for best flavor
Season gradually and taste as you go
